skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Places a 25% [Decrease C. DMG] debuff and a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns on targets whose ATK is higher than their DEF. Places a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff and a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns on targets whose ATK is equal to or lower than their DEF.

Lvl. 4 Damage +5%

skills.desc: Places a 50% [Ally Protection] buff on all allies except this Champion for 3 turns. Places a 25% [Strengthen] buff on this Champion for 3 turns.
skills.name: Bottoms Up

skills.desc: Decreases the damage all allies receive from critical hits by 30%. This Champion will receive that damage instead.
